assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.

group.label: Ethics approval and consent to participate
group.name: EthicsHeading

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Written informed consent was obtained from all participants. All procedures were approved by the Ethics Committee of Rennes University Hospital and the French law (CCTIRS Comité Consultatif sur le Traitement de l’Information en matière de Recherche dans le domaine de la Santé) or the Human Research Ethics Committee of the Royal Children’s Hospital, Melbourne (HREC/22073).
